title: User Profile Management
description: As a registered user, I want to manage my profile information so that I can keep my account details current and control my privacy settings.

acceptanceCriteria.description: User can view their current profile information
User can edit basic profile fields (name, email, phone)
User can upload and update profile picture
User can change password with current password verification
User receives confirmation when profile changes are saved
Invalid email formats are rejected with clear error messages

tasks.description: Implement profile update API endpoint with validation
Write unit tests for profile management

childStories.title: Privacy Settings Management
childStories.description: As a user, I want to control my privacy settings so that I can manage who can see my profile information.

childStories.title: Account Deactivation
childStories.description: As a user, I want to deactivate my account so that I can temporarily suspend my profile without losing my data.

investAnalysis.feedback: Story meets all INVEST criteria with clear acceptance tests and appropriate scope.
